long_description: The stylish Scott Remit ski poles are designed to handle fast, aggressive skiing. S2 shaft is manufactured with high-grade aluminum alloy and is computer engineered for excellent strength. Thermoplastic and polypropylene grip offers a lightweight, streamlined profile that makes it easy to do a textbook tuck. Leather straps offer solid style as you plant your poles; rip-and-stick tabs offer quick adjustment. 2.36 in. disc basket blends aerodynamic efficiency and durability; ideal for packed snow conditions. Scott Remit ski poles include the Ice Tip for superb hold in icy conditions.
short_description: The stylish Scott Remit ski poles are designed to handle fast, aggressive skiing.
